column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I love noodle soup of all kinds
column2: and ramen is no exception.  However
column3: Jinya's creations are often too salty and somewhat forced.  Any ramen or noodle soup lovers know it's all in the authenticity of the broth.  So when a restaurant's soup base isn't flavorful and developed enough to carry the rest of the ingredients
